revision.text:
{{Use dmy dates|date=October 2014}} {{Infobox album | name = Nena die Band | type = compilation | artist = [[Nena (band)|Nena]] | cover = Nena Die Band - Cover.jpg | released = {{start date|1991|9|16|df=yes}} | recorded = 1982–1986 | genre = [[Neue Deutsche Welle|NDW]], [[pop rock]], [[Pop music|pop]] | length = {{duration|m=60|s=29}} | language = German | label = [[Epic Records|Epic]] | chronology = [[Nena (band)]] | prev_title = [[Eisbrecher (Nena album)|Eisbrecher]] | prev_year = 1986 | misc = {{Extra chronology | artist = [[Nena]] | type = compilation | prev_title = [[Wunder gescheh'n]] | prev_year = 1989 | title = Nena die Band | year = 1991 | next_title = [[Bongo Girl]] | next_year = 1992 }} {{Singles | name = Nena die Band | type = compilation | single1 = {{lang|de|Lass mich dein Pirat sein}} (remix) | single1date = 1991 }} }}
'''''Nena die Band''''' is a best-of album by German pop group [[Nena (band)|Nena]], released in 1991. The first track, "Lass mich dein Pirat sein", is a remix.<ref name="Pirat">{{cite web|url=http://www.nena.de/de/discografie/lass-mich-dein-pirat-sein-remix|title=Lass mich dein Pirat sein (1991 remix, single)|website=Nena.de|accessdate=4 September 2016}}</ref> The version of "[[99 Luftballons]]" here combines the original recording with a live recording.
==Title== The dot (period) at the end, which is usually not included in titles, is emphasized with red on the album's cover. Furthermore, on the official Nena website, unlike other releases in catalogue, this particular album is consistently referred to as ''“Nena – Die Band'''.<!--sic!-->'''”'' (note the period again).<ref name="Pirat" /><ref name="nena.de">[http://www.nena.de/de/discografie/nena-die-band ''Nena die Band''] at the official Nena website, with complete lyrics and samples for music. Retrieved 4 September 2016.</ref> This indicates the total end of the band's lifespan, in fact completed four years earlier. All subsequent releases under the name Nena, as well as previous album ''[[Wunder gescheh'n]]'' (1989), are solo albums of [[Nena|Nena Kerner]].
==Track listing== {{Track listing | extra_column = Original release
| title1 = Lass mich dein Pirat sein | note1 = 1991 remix: "Let Me Be Your Pirate" | extra1 = ''[[? (Nena album)|? (Fragezeichen)]]'' (1984) | length1 = 3:56
| title2 = [[Nena (album)#"Nur geträumt"|Nur geträumt]] | note2 = "Just a Dream" | extra2 = ''[[Nena (album)|Nena]]'' (1983) | length2 = 3:41
| title3 = Ganz oben | note3 = "Right at the Top" | extra3 = B-side to single "[[Nena (album)#"Nur geträumt"|Nur geträumt]]" (1982) | length3 = 3:30
| title4 = Vollmond | note4 = "Full Moon" | extra4 = ''[[Nena (album)|Nena]]'' (1983) | length4 = 3:02
| title5 = [[? (Nena album)#Title track|? (Fragezeichen)]] | note5 = "Question Mark" | extra5 = ''[[? (Nena album)|?]]'' (1984) | length5 = 4:30
| title6 = Rette mich | note6 = "Rescue Me" | extra6 = ''[[? (Nena album)|?]]'' (1984) | length6 = 3:18
| title7 = [[Irgendwie, irgendwo, irgendwann]] | note7 = "Somehow, Somewhere, Sometime", aka "Anyplace, Anywhere, Anytime" | extra7 = ''[[Feuer und Flamme]]'' (1985) | length7 = 7:15
| title8 = Du kennst die Liebe nicht | note8 = single version: "You Don't Know What Love Is" | extra8 = Single from ''[[Feuer und Flamme]]'' (1986) | length8 = 3:45
| title9 = [[Eisbrecher (Nena album)#"Jetzt bist du weg"|Jetzt bist du weg]] | note9 = "Now You Are Gone" | extra9 = ''[[Eisbrecher (Nena album)|Eisbrecher]]'' (1986) | length9 = 4:53
| title10 = Tokyo | extra10 = ''[[Eisbrecher (Nena album)|Eisbrecher]]'' (1986) | length10 = 4:28
| title11 = [[99 Luftballons]] | note11 = "99 Balloons", aka "99 Red Balloons" | extra11 = ''[[Nena (album)|Nena]]'' (1983) | length11 = 3:48
| title12 = [[Nena (album)#"Leuchtturm"|Leuchtturm]] | note12 = live version: "Lighthouse" | extra12 = ''[[Nena (album)|Nena]]'' (1983) | length12 = 2:50
| title13 = Unerkannt durch's Märchenland | note13 = live version: "Unrecognized Through Fairyland" | extra13 = ''[[? (Nena album)|?]]'' (1984) | length13 = 3:12
| title14 = Tanz auf dem Vulkan | note14 = live version: "Dance on the Volcano", aka "Living on the Edge" | extra14 = ''[[Nena (album)|Nena]]'' (1983) | length14 = 3:10
| title15 = Satellitenstadt | note15 = live version: "Satellite Town" | extra15 = ''[[Nena (album)|Nena]]'' (1983) | length15 = 5:03 }}
Tracks 12 and 15 recorded live in Offenbach on 2 April 1984. Tracks 13 and 14 recorded live in Hamburg on 26 March 1984.<ref name="nena.de" />
The above track list represents the CD version of the album. [[LP record|LP]] edition<ref>{{cite web|url=http://www.discogs.com/Nena-Die-Band/release/2496537|title=''Nena die Band'' – LP, vinyl (Epic 469100 1)|website=[[Discogs]]|accessdate=30 September 2016}}</ref> omits "Ganz oben" and two of the four live tracks ("Unerkannt durchs Märchenland" and "Tanz auf dem Vulkan") but includes a very short 15-second track "Der Bus is' schon weg" (from ''[[? (Nena album)|? (Fragezeichen)]]'', 1984).
